description:
One final hurdle, and the prom situation will finally be over… but will Hachiman’s search for something genuine be so easily resolved?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Ma comédie romantique d`adolescent est bien une erreur.
My Teen Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, as I Expected.
Yahari Ore no Seishun LoveCome wa Machigatte Iru.
كوميديتي الرومانسية الشبابية خاطئة كما توقعت.
やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている.
